channel.title: Hi! I'm Zak - bootstrapping Fuzzelogic Solutions, Proxitee and soon Crowdsourcer
channel.description:
I'm currently bootstrapping Fuzzelogic Solutions : a mobile app development studio Proxitee : A platform to provide context to a users location Crowdsourcer : Allowing you to collect data by using the crowd
Bootstrapping and interested in get insights into growing and gaining traction and building a community around our products. Ive made a few mistakes and realise there's always an option - and will to share what I can

item.title: Hi! I'm Zak - bootstrapping Fuzzelogic Solutions, Proxitee and soon Crowdsourcer

item.description:
I’m currently bootstrapping
Fuzzelogic Solutions : a mobile app development studio
Proxitee : A platform to provide context to a users location
Crowdsourcer : Allowing you to collect data by using the crowd

Bootstrapping and interested in get insights into growing and gaining traction and building a community around our products.
Ive made a few mistakes and realise there’s always an option - and will to share what I can
